scripts.dev: npm run build:packages && npm run dev --workspace=teacher-ui
scripts.build:packages: npm run build --workspace=@viccoboard/core && npm run build --workspace=@viccoboard/plugins && npm run build --workspace=@viccoboard/storage && npm run build --workspace=@viccoboard/students && npm run build --workspace=@viccoboard/exams && npm run build --workspace=@viccoboard/sport
scripts.build:all: npm run build:packages && npm run build --workspace=@viccoboard/demo --workspace=teacher-ui
scripts.build:ipad: npm run build:packages && npm run build --workspace=teacher-ui
scripts.demo: npm run build:packages && cd apps/demo && npm run dev
scripts.typecheck: npm run build:packages && npm run typecheck --workspace=teacher-ui
